title: Pangolin homology associated with 2019-nCoV
author: Tao Zhang, Qunfu Wu, Zhigang Zhang,#
affiliations: State key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Bio-Resources in Yunnan
School of Life Sciences, Yunnan University, Kunming, Yunnan, 650091, China
abstract: To explore potential intermediate host of a novel coronavirus is vital to rapidly control continuous COVID-19 spread. We found genomic and evolutionary evidences of the occurrence of 2019-nCoV-like coronavirus (named as Pangolin-CoV) from dead Malayan

award-group.funding-source: Second Tibetan Plateau Scientific Expedition and Research
National Key Research and Development Program of China
Key Research Program of the Chinese Academy of Sciences
